title: Charging port issue
content: I just got a pixel 2xl , and I tried charging it but it went off as soon as I insert the charger, tried this so many times but still the same. Then I power it on again and tried my pixel earpiece to see if the phone will recognize it but still yet not working, my music just playing from phone speaker. And if I remove and put it again ,the phone will went off. Pls kindly proffer solutions to this please.
